title: BBC Local Live: Essex on Tuesday, 8 March 2016 - BBC News
summary: essex police announces probe into child sex abuse allegations dating back to the 1980s and 1990s .
man who fled country jailed for manslaughter of graduate in southend .
former essex county council worker jailed for inciting underage sex .
more news , sport , travel and weather from 08:00 on wednesday .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: updates for essex live have finished for today - thanks for joining us .
we 'll be back tomorrow with the latest news for the county .
have a great evening .

documents.title: weather : heavy rain arriving overnight
text: it will be cloudy with outbreaks of patchy rain or drizzle for much of the night before persistent , heavy rain starts to spread in from the west during the early hours .
minimum temperature : 4c ( 39f ) .
tomorrow , it will remain windy with heavy rain through the morning , though this will ease into the afternoon , with the rain becoming lighter and patchier .
get the latest weather forecast here .
author: Alex Dolan
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: southend murder victim had 'battled childhood leukaemia '
text: a `` charismatic and humorous '' teenager murdered in southend last month had previously fought leukaemia , it has emerged .
today the `` heartbroken '' family of nico ramasay , who died after being stabbed in napier avenue on 13 february , paid tribute to the 19-year-old .
`` he was a caring and genuine young man who loved his brothers , nieces , nephews and cousin , always encouraging and supporting them to do well '' , mr ramasay 's family said .

documents.title: headlines : essex child abuse probe could involve more than 40 victims family pay tribute to 'charismatic ' murder victim
text: here are the top stories for essex :
author: Nick Alliker
BBC Essex

documents.title: your a calm afternoon in tollesbury
text: thanks to bbc weather watcher , pepperpot , who sent us this great photo taken in tollesbury earlier today .
we love seeing your photos around the county .
you can send an email or tweet us .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: takeaway delivery driver robbed of three-figure sum of cash
text: a braintree takeaway delivery driver has been robbed of a three-figure sum of cash , police say .
the 20-year-old man was dropping off food in northumberland close at about 20:00 on saturday when he was approached by two men .
the victim is said to have been left `` badly shaken up by this incident '' and is no longer working as a delivery driver as a result .

documents.title: ministers to consider essex ex-banker libor conviction transfer request
text: ministers have insisted they will carefully consider any request to allow an ex-banker from essex convicted of fixing the libor interest rate to return to the uk to serve his sentence .
anthony conti , from westcliff-on-sea , is reportedly due to be sentenced by a us judge this week after he was found guilty of a series of fraud charges last november .
conservative mp for southend west , sir david amess , made the plea on behalf of his constituent in the commons today .
justice minister andrew selous said `` careful consideration '' would be given to any transfer application .

documents.title: police investigating vilson meshi murder release cctv
text: police investigating the murder of a 30-year-old in pitsea have released cctv of somebody on a bike they would like to trace .
vilson meshi was found dead inside a burned audi a4 on pincey mead , near pitsea road , on 27 february .
four teenagers arrested over his death have been bailed .
det ch insp stephen jennings said : `` this person was captured on cctv in pincey mead in the early hours of the morning before vilson 's body was discovered .
i need to find this person to understand what they were doing in the area at that time . ''

documents.title: manslaughter sentence 'will never bring my son back '
text: after abdulfatah suleiman was jailed for 16 years for the manslaughter of anton levin ( in southend , mr levin 's mother released the following statement :
we are very disappointed that this man suleiman was found guilty of manslaughter and not murder .
he had the knife and he killed my son anton levin .
he has been jailed for 16 years but i would have preferred that he had been jailed for life . ''

documents.title: woman has handbag stolen while visiting mother 's grave
text: liz cundy was visiting her mum 's grave on mother 's day when thieves broke into her car and stole her handbag .
essex police says it 's one of three recent incidents of robberies at chelmsford crematorium in writtle road .
ms cundy , who is from braintree , told us she 's devastated .

documents.title: weather : mostly dry this afternoon with some brightness
text: as we go through the afternoon , cloud will thicken with western parts seeing one or two outbreaks of light rain .
maximum temperature : 8c ( 46f ) .
stay up-to-date with the latest weather forecast here .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: former essex county council worker jailed for inciting underage sex
text: a former worker at essex county council has been jailed for 16 months for accessing official records to try to force a 15-year-old girl to have sex with him .
aaron whitman , 26 , of pirie road , west bergholt , repeatedly contacted the schoolgirl via a fake facebook account , to offer her cash for sex , ipswich crown court heard .
whitman , who pleaded guilty at an earlier hearing to inciting a child to engage in sexual activity and misconduct in a public office , must stay on the sex offenders register for 10 years .

documents.title: essex cricketers travel 4,000 miles to abu dhabi - but match is cancelled
text: essex county cricket club have travelled over 4,000 miles toabu dhabi for a pre-season friendly - only for a match to be postponed due to a waterlogged pitch .
the team were due to play worcestershire in a t20 match as part of their united arab emirates tour .
the club 's groundsman saw the funny side though .
he tweeted : `` ground fit at chelmsford today if they want to pop back for a match ! ''
today 's t20 match versus @ twitterid has been called off due to a waterlogged pitch in abu dhabi ( yes , we did say waterlogged pitch ! )
# uaetour
@ twitterid @ twitterid ground fit at chelmsford today if they want to pop back for a match !
@ twitterid i think a big shout-out is due to @ twitterid and @ twitterid who travelled out for the big game .
@ twitterid
@ twitterid @ twitterid you can take the cricket out of england
@ twitterid @ twitterid even new road might have less water !

documents.title: essex police child sex abuse probe : what we know so far
text: earlier today essex police announced that it was investigating allegations of the sexual abuse of children in care in the 1980s and 1990s .
here 's what we know so far :

documents.title: headlines : police launch historical child abuse probe former essex county council worker jailed for inciting underage sex
text: here are the top stories from the essex newsroom this lunchtime :
author: Nick Alliker
BBC Essex

documents.title: man jailed for manslaughter of graduate in southend
text: a man who fled the country following the death of a university graduate has been jailed for 16 years .
anton levin , from dagenham , was stabbed at a house in st anns road , southend on 19 november 2014 .
abdulfatah suleiman , 28 , was arrested in norway and extradited back to the uk .
after being convicted of manslaughter last month , suleiman was today handed a 16-year sentence at chelmsford crown court .

documents.title: council leader speaks on historical child abuse allegations
text: essex county council says it has been `` made aware '' of historical child abuse allegations in relation to members of its staff in the 1980s and 1990s .
david finich , the council leader , said in a statement the accusations were `` very serious '' .
`` we know that concerns were investigated at that time by the council and essex police , appropriate actions were taken in accordance with the evidence available '' , he said .

documents.title: police child sex abuse probe : 'there could be more than 40 victims '
text: more than 40 victims could be involved in a historical child sex abuse investigation announced today by essex police , the county 's police and crime commissioner nick alston has said .
the force announced this morning that it was investigating allegations of sex abuse of children in care in the 1980s and 1990s .

mr alston told bbc essex : `` the concerns of the professionals who spoke to us were that there were more , many more victims - perhaps more than 40 victims - who may not have had the right kind of safeguarding . ''

documents.title: braintree continue push for play-offs tonight
text: braintree town 's national league play-off push goes to torquay tonight .
the iron have lost just one in nine to climb to fourth in the table .
former football league side torquay are fighting to avoid relegation , but braintree boss danny cowley told bbc essex they are a `` tough prospect '' .
author: Ben Fryer
BBC Essex Sport

documents.title: thieves steal child 's money box in pilgrims hatch
text: a child 's money box is among the items stolen in a burglary near brentwood , police say .
thieves raided the property in osborne road , pilgrims hatch on 1 march .
the box contained a three-figure sum of cash .
a smart tv , and an apple macbook were also taken .

documents.title: essex council leader challenges prime minister over cuts
text: the conservative leader of essex county council has challenged the prime minister to come and see for himself the problems that councils are facing in trying to balance their books .
the local authority is facing a £ 50m gap in its budget , largely caused by the rising costs in caring for the elderly .
david finch called on david cameron to come and `` see the issues first-hand '' and then `` actually listen to the people who can make the changes possible '' .

documents.title: essex gran , 90 , left 'lying in puddle of urine ' after waiting 'seven hours ' for ambulance
text: a pensioner with dementia was left `` lying in a puddle of urine '' after breaking her hip and being made to wait `` seven hours '' for an ambulance .
author: Brentwood Gazette

documents.title: police and crime commissioner to speak on child sex abuse probe shortly
text: the police and crime commissioner for essex nick alston is due to be interviewed on bbc essex within the next hour on the force 's investigation into allegations of child sex abuse in the 1980s and 1990s .
in the mean time we 'll be taking a look at some other stories from around the county .

documents.title: essex police probe announced after yellow advertiser exclusive
text: police will conduct a formal review into claims of alleged child abuse in the 1980s and 1990s , following an exclusive story in the yellow advertiser .
the paper claims an an alleged `` paedophile ring '' in shoeburyness was not properly investigated .

it says whistleblowers told it in a case in the late 1980s , which saw two men convicted of abusing young boys , dozens of alleged victims were not taken seriously and other alleged abusers were not pursued .

documents.title: child care professionals had 'serious concerns ' over handling of child abuse claims
text: child care professionals raised `` serious concerns '' over how a number of essex police investigations were carried out into child abuse claims in the 1980s and 1990s .
during that period , two people were convicted of abuse , but three child care professionals working at that time said police investigations may not have been `` sufficiently thorough '' .
the claims surfaced following a meeting on 25 february , the details of which have only been made public today .

documents.title: police chief calls for historical child abuse victims to 'come forward '
text: victims of child abuse during the 1980s and 1990s are being urged to come forward by essex police .

chief constable stephen kavanagh said : `` whether alleged abuse , especially organised and institutionalised , happened yesterday or 30 years ago , it 's our duty to review it without fear or favour . ''
any victims are being advised to contact the force on 101 , asking to speak to a specialist officer within the child abuse investigation teams .

documents.title: child abuse probe follows meeting with with child care professionals
text: essex police 's announcement of a review of child abuse allegations follows a meeting between chief constable stephen kavanagh , police and crime commissioner nick alston and three child care professionals .
they are retired district psychologist robin jamieson , former clinician manager of the suffolk child sexual abuse treatment service jenny grinsted , and youth worker and probation officer rob west .
all were involved in child protection work in essex during the 1980s and 1990s .

documents.title: essex police to examine child abuse claims in 'scrupulous detail '
text: allegations of sexual abuse of children in care during the 1980s and 1990s will be examined in `` scrupulous detail '' , essex police says .
the force is looking at claims of sexual offences , particularly against young boys in local authority or foster care .

documents.title: child sex abuse probe has 'allegations , but no victims , suspects or locations '
text: essex police has announced this morning that it is to investigate allegations of sex abuse of children in care in the 1980s and 1990s .
it comes after people working in child protection during that period raised concerns with the county 's chief constable and the police and crime commissioner during a recent meeting .
essex police says at the moment it only has allegations but no victims , suspects or locations .
it 's looking at claims of sexual offences against children - particularly boys - in local authority or foster care .

documents.title: breakingessex police to investigate historical child sex abuse of young boys in care
text: essex police is to investigate allegations of child sex abuse of young boys in care in the 1980s and 1990s .
more to follow .

documents.title: men detained after immigration raid at curry house
text: five bangladeshi men were detained during an immigration operation at a curry house in leigh-on-sea , the home office says .
officers arrested the men , aged 24 , 25 , 27 , 28 and 34 , at the shibash indian in the town 's broadway on friday .
four have been held pending removal from the uk .

documents.title: weather : mostly dry today with some brightness
text: after a frosty start , the rest of this morning will be dry with some sunny spells .
as we go through the day , cloud will thicken .
maximum temperature : 8c ( 46f ) .
you can stay up-to-date with the latest weather forecast throughout the day here .
author: Kate Kinsella
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: headlines : essex council leader challenges prime minister over cuts five bangladeshi men arrested in southend immigration operation
text: headlines : essex council leader challenges prime minister over cuts five bangladeshi men arrested in southend immigration operation
author: Sonia Watson
BBC Essex

documents.title: welcome to local live in essex
text: hello there - a bit of a chilly start in essex - full weather forecast shortly .
join us until 18:00 this evening for the latest news for the county .
if you 'd like to comment on any our stories , you can send us an email , tweet us , or visit our facebook page .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live
